General.Name: Shaanxi Zhongtian Rocket Technology
General.Description: Shaanxi Zhongtian Rocket Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of solid rockets and their extended products in China. It offers rain-enhancing and hail-proofing, sounding, and small guided rockets; carbon/charcoal thermal field materials and solid rocket motor ablation resistant material components; and intelligent weighing systems. The company also provides aircraft carbon/carbon brake discs, carbon/ceramic composite materials, special alloy high-voltage contact materials, mold material products, and measurement and control system integration wait. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Xi'an, China.
